output_list.reason: The function does not check for the balance of the recipient address. An attacker can send tokens to an address with a fallback function that allows them to steal the tokens.

output_list.code: function batchTransfer(address[] _receivers, uint256 _value) public whenNotPaused returns (bool)
output_list.vulnerability: Arbitrary Token Transfer via Batch Operation
output_list.reason: The function allows a user to transfer tokens to multiple addresses in one transaction without any validation on the validity of these recipient addresses. This can lead to unauthorized token transfers if an attacker controls some of the addresses in the array.
